code: var rtlScripts=new Set(['Arab','Syrc','Samr','Mand','Thaa','Mend','Nkoo','Adlm','Rohg','Hebr']);var rtlLangs=new Set(['ae','ar','arc','bcc','bqi','ckb','dv','fa','far','glk','he','iw','khw','ks','ku','mzn','nqo','pnb','ps','sd','ug','ur','yi']);var cache=new Map();export function isLocaleRTL(locale){var cachedRTL=cache.get(locale);if(cachedRTL){return cachedRTL;}var isRTL=false;if(Intl.Locale){var script=new Intl.Locale(locale).maximize().script;isRTL=rtlScripts.has(script);}else{var lang=locale.split('-')[0];isRTL=rtlLangs.has(lang);}cache.set(locale,isRTL);return isRTL;}
